DOC.brief_title: The Real Clinical Background of Advanced Colorectal Cancer Treatment Situation Survey
DOC.detailed_description: The Primary Objectives of this study is collect the real clinical background of advanced colorectal cancer treatment situation of China. The Secondary Objectives is the mutation of K-ras , targeting therapy , use present situation of cetuximab and liver metastases treatment situation of colorectal cancer patients.
DOC.criteria: Patients with histologically or cytologically confirmed diagnosis of metastatic colorectal cancer. Patients with histologically or cytologically confirmed diagnosis other than metastatic colorectal cancer.
